page.title: 05TRANSPORT IN HOLMESFIELD
page.content: Bus services 35 and 36 are run by{ {Chesterfield transport.}These services run every 2 hours from Chesterfield to Holmesfield.They also run a school bus which serves Henry Fanshawe School in Dronfield.Other than these they supply a{Silver Service}bus which goes every Sunday to the Peak District area of Baslow,Derwent Dams and Castleton.The rest of the transport in our area is supplied by{South Yorkshire Transport} who supply a regular hourly service from Sheffield to Holmesfield. Holmesfield Parish Council have recently provided a bus shelter. A{taxi}is provided for children who live a mile from school or from public transport.During periods of snow people rely on Land Rovers for their transport.Elderly people are cared for by the{good neighbour scheme.}The disabled also have a special bus.
